
# Function


## ```js isEmail ```


Check if the passed value is a valid email address

## Parameters

- **value**  Mixed: The value to check



## Example (js)

```js
import isEmail from '@coffeekraken/sugar/js/is/email';
isEmail('john.doe@gmail.com') => true
isEmail('plop@yop.com') => true
isEmail('hello') => false
```
